content: Hello. I'd like to present to you Prosperity Truth Coalition (PTC) Token! More bots will be purchased from our partner projects. The dApp will have full Buy/Sell functionality + Staking $PTC for Binance Pegged $XRP as well as a Voluntary Burn Portal to help lower supply and create scarcity! I just registered the domain and put a landing page while the dApp is being made.http://ptctoken.io/Our Discord Serverhttps://discord.gg/c8cf6GXnOur Twitterhttps://twitter.com/PTCTokenThe Dexscreener:https://dexscreener.com/bsc/0x3a652ee2ecba19afbf16dc50c34a418b1c2e7827The PTC Token Smart Contract:https://bscscan.com/token/0xf382A28AAb0320e48D3D751f696f935B014B49BDThe PancakeSwap Trading Pair Contract:https://bscscan.com/address/0x3A652EE2ECba19AFbF16Dc50C34A418b1C2e7827Any questions I'm happy to answer.
